short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension built for  keeping notes or often-used strings of text at an arm's length to easily copy and paste.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a shelf for your notes, ideas, canned responses, and company passwords (I'm kidding, don't do this).
